instruction: Summarize the following article about AI within 100 words.
input: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly becoming an integral part of the way in which we live our lives. From making decisions in the medical field to controlling devices in the home, AI is already making its mark in countless areas of life. Its potential applications in fields such as healthcare, education, transportation and manufacturing are continuously being studied and experimented with, and its potential future impact is the object of great speculation and excitement.
output: AI is being deployed in numerous areas of life and is showing tremendous potential in fields like healthcare, education, transportation, and manufacturing. AI-based decision making, driverless cars, and other innovations are improving everyday life and could have an even bigger impact in the future. AI is a rapidly growing field and its applications are being developed at an ever-accelerating rate.
